name: Gethaut
description: The cyberpunk shooter with horror elements. The plot tells about fight of military corporations and opposition of cars and demons. In a game there are no settings, a game goes on the maximum graphics. Unique gameplay and system of preservation of a game. You should plunge into the world of a nightmare which you created the hands. Your hero the biomechanical car, live flesh in mechanical armor. He has one task one purpose, to execute orders of the operator, the supercomputer of the baby connected to reason. A game from the first person, In a game is several types of weapon and to reservation. You receive new arms and modifications of armor automatically in process of playing the game. Locations in a game are not similar at each other, you will visit both the earth and in space. (Not at all stories a happy end, and this one of them.)
